Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing, fine-tuning, and deploying applications built on large language models (LLMs), including RAG-like activities and building production-grade systems. This aligns perfectly with the core responsibilities and project examples of a GenAI Engineer.
